name: Stronger Together (Readyforeal)
description:
Controls

Blue Character Controls
WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Grab/Interact

Red Character Controls
Right click - Move/Grab/Interact

Instructions

Combine into a stronger purple character by pressing spacebar when the two characters are near one another. Purple portals and boxes require both characters to interact with by combining

Created by

Nickels and Readyforeal

https://nickels.itch.io/

https://readyforeal.itch.io/
